essentials.Name: Replacement Cushions for Tulip Side Chairs
essentials.Body:
Searching for an alternate cushion tint? Redecorated and necessitating an update to your set? Maybe your feline friend has its own preferred chair! Worry not - our replacement Tulip Side Chair cushions are designed to please the eye while delivering long-term quality. Crafted from a combination of synthetic materials, they boast a luxuriously soft feel while also being highly sturdy and resilient. Make your selection from among our five vivid and sumptuous tints.

These cushions are made for our (post July 2023) Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs, if you are looking for cushions for our previous plastic chairs please call us for availability.

essentials.Body: The Little Tulip shop does include a marble care & sealing pack with every purchase of a qualifying table or dining set as standard! But perhaps you want another or have a need to refresh a table you already own, look no further as everything you need is in the box<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">Pack contains:<br data-mce-fragment="1"><br data-mce-fragment="1">Akemi Nano Stain Repellent Sealer<br data-mce-fragment="1">354ml Method Marble & Granite Cleaner<br data-mce-fragment="1">Microfiber Cloths<br data-mce-fragment="1">Safety Gloves<br data-mce-fragment="1">Full Printed Instructions

essentials.Name: Method Eco-Friendly Marble & Granite Daily Cleaner
essentials.Body: We wholeheartedly recommend Method Daily Granite & Marble Care for your everyday table cleaning needs. Not only does it get the job done with spillages, grease and dirt, but it does so with a gentle and ecological solution without the need for tough chemicals, harmful for both table and the environment. We do include a bottle in your free care pack purchase with any table, but if you need more you can find varying pack sizes right here.

tulip-side-tables.Name: 50 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Side Table
tulip-side-tables.Body:
Our clever Tulip Side Tables are the perfect addition to any room - or larger dining table! Seamless in design, the 50cm table adds a touch of luxury to any lounge, bedroom, conservatory, or hallway. Take risks and make a statement with one of our most versatile pieces!

Discover an array of marble, laminate, and veneer finishes to energize your interior space!

Compliment your interior space with a choice from our marble, laminate and veneer options.

tulip-chairs.Name: The Saarinen Tulip Fiberglass Side Dining Chair
tulip-chairs.Body:
The Eero Saarinen Tulip Side Chair is a mid-century design of now iconic status! What is even more remarkable about this chair is that its style and graceful features are potentially more relevant in today’s modern and contemporary interior as they ever were at the time of conception.
The Tulip Side Chair is the perfect dining chair (or even the perfect chair for any application) with comfort and ergonomics ensuring that it never gets tiring. The removable soft and durable seat cushions ensure that it always remains as good to sit on as it does to look at.
We have recreated this icon in high quality sustainable fibreglass, thus guaranteeing many great years of dependable service!

tulip-chairs.Name: The Saarinen Tulip Fiberglass Arm Dining Chair
tulip-chairs.Body: The Tulip Arm Chair, originally designed by Eero Saarinen in 1955 stands as a testament to classic design. Its beautiful sleek base flows into the 'bucket' style carver top providing the user with additional support for arms.<br data-mce-fragment="1">Our recreation of this iconic chair devotes itself to its original dimensions, high quality fibreglass material, and stunning visual allure. <br data-mce-fragment="1">Often used as 'carvers' at the ends of tables or even as standalone chairs, they make for such versatile seating, whether it be at the dinner table or elsewhere. The Tulip Arm is the perfect accompaniment to the Tulip Side Chair and also works on its own as a boudoir, bedroom or orangery option.

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 200 x 120 cm Saarinen Tulip Table & 6 Side Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
Every dining room, no matter the space or grandeur, is the centre piece of our home, the meeting point of family and friends and the focal point of good times spent. It comes as no surprise then, that this most precious of spaces is one of the most loved, one with the greatest of thought when it comes to how it makes us feel. Getting this interior right then, just how one wants it to be, is high on our personal wish lists. Call us bias but the 200 x 120 Oval Tulip dining table with matching fiberglass chairs is quintessentially the top choice and its ability to seamlessly slot into absolutely any interior design is the secret to its success.

Set consists of:

6 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 200 x 120 cm Oval Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

Celebrate your home and delight your guests with this iconic set of the 200 x 120 cm Oval Tulip Table and 4 matching side and 2 arm chairs - designed to create a warm, inviting atmosphere with its striking beauty and beguiling curves.

The dining room table is more than a piece of furniture - it's a cultural hub, a place for everyday meals and meaningful conversations. Celebrate your home and delight your guests with this iconic set of the 200 x 120 cm Oval Tulip Table and 4 matching side and 2 arm chairs - designed to create a warm, inviting atmosphere with its striking beauty and beguiling curves.

Set consists of:

4 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Arm Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 200 x 120 cm Oval Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 170 x 110 cm Saarinen Tulip Table & 6 Side Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
No fluff, no filler, no false hype - our 170 x 110 cm Tulip Table with 6 matching fibreglass side chairs is all of these things (stunning, beautiful, gorgeous, luxurious) that are so often used - and misused - to describe anything and everything online. Perfect for 4 or 6, this magnificent dining set is the definition of style, grace and panache. Put the chairs where they belong, and behold - a stunning vista of timeless elegance!

Set consists of:

1 x 170 x 110 cm Oval Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 170 x 110 cm Oval Tulip Table & 4 Side, 2 Arm Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
In a world of seemingly limitless options, how does one even go about finding something entirely refreshing, contemporary, and yet ’classic’ rolled into one? It seems after all, a contradiction to even begin to think we can find all these things together. So up steps our amazing 170 Oval Tulip table & chair sets and here you might just find the answer! Classic design indeed, they have a super modern high-quality look and feel and will for many years to come be your contemporary setting to make memories and bring the friends and family together.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Arm Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
4 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 170 x 110 cm Oval Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

In a world of seemingly limitless options, how does one even go about finding something entirely refreshing, contemporary, and yet ’classic’ rolled into one? It seems after all, a contradiction to even begin to think we can find all these things together. So up steps our amazing 170 Oval Tulip table & chair sets and here you might just find the answer! Classic design indeed, they have a super modern high-quality look and feel and will for many years to come be your contemporary setting to make memories and bring the friends and family together.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Arm Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
4 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 170 x 110 cm Oval Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 120 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Table & 6 Side Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
Tulip dining sets don't get any better than this! The large, classic circular table comes with 6 of the iconic fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs plus a selection of luxuriant cushions in deep, vibrant colors. Perfect for a dinner, party, or coffee date - it'll fit in no matter the room size, wallpaper, wood floor, orangery, conservatory, kitchen decor- modern or classic. Tulip Tables always look great & have been a top choice for years.

6 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 120 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

Add a little bit of décor happiness to your home with the simply gorgeous circular 120 cm Tulip Table with a stunning array of choices for the top & four Tulip side chairs. There is a reason the Tulip design featured wooden tops early in its conception, the combination and fusion of both modern and natural elements makes for a visual and stunning feast of a design.

Set consists of:

4 x Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 120 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 90 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Table & 4 Side Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
This is one of the most classic designs of the last mid-century, the small Tulip Table with Marble Top and four matching fibreglass Side Chairs. Eero Saarinen's 1955 design has really stood the test of time. In fact, it has not only aged well, but aged better. This table and chair set remains one of the most desirable today and is as affordable as ever.

Set consists of:

4 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 90 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 90 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Table & 2 Side Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
Who said "Small is beautiful"? We may never know, but it's certainly appropriate for this lovely, little set: a 90cm circular Tulip Table plus two matching side chairs - ideal for spaces too snug for bigger choices. Plus, they're so flexible they can double up as an occasional piece. Wherever you need it – move it there! Give your kitchen dining space an uplift and add this fantastic small marble table and chair set today.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 90 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

We may never know, but it's certainly appropriate for this lovely, little set: a 90cm circular Tulip Table plus two matching side chairs - ideal for spaces too snug for bigger choices. Plus, they're so flexible they can double up as an occasional piece. Wherever you need it – move it there! Give your kitchen dining space an uplift and add this fantastic small marble table and chair set today.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Side Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 90 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-table-chair-sets.Name: 90 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Table & 2 Arm Chair Set
tulip-table-chair-sets.Body:
Make a dramatic statement in your small space with this Saarinen 90 cm Circular Tulip Table & two matching Tulip Arm Chairs. Don't let limited space prevent you from enjoying the glamorous feel of a marble, veneer, or laminate table with iconic chairs. This small set provides eye-catching style with versatile function - perfect for your own corner of the world or use it as an occasional table. The Tulip Arm Chairs are distinctive from their Side Chair sisters with arms for extra support and curvaceous shapes.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Arm Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 90 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

Don't let limited space prevent you from enjoying the glamorous feel of a marble, veneer, or laminate table with iconic chairs. This small set provides eye-catching style with versatile function - perfect for your own corner of the world or use it as an occasional table. The Tulip Arm Chairs are distinctive from their Side Chair sisters with arms for extra support and curvaceous shapes.

Set consists of:

2 x High Quality Fiberglass Tulip Arm Chairs with a choice of 5 cushion colours
1 x 90 cm Circular Tulip Table with a choice of finishes

tulip-tables.Name: 200 x 120 cm Saarinen Oval Tulip Dining Table
tulip-tables.Body:
A seamless synthesis of luxury and mid-century wonder, the 200 x 120 cm Saarinen Oval Tulip Dining Table offers an unparalleled experience for the discerning connoisseur. An expertly crafted masterpiece, its elegance and class will be the talk of your dining room. Perfect for four, six or even eight persons, The Tulip Table shows that style and functionality can be the same thing after all.
Choose from an extensive selection of marble, laminate, and veneer finishes to best complement your interiors.

tulip-tables.Name: 170 x 110 cm Oval Saarinen Tulip Dining Table
tulip-tables.Body:
The iconic, timeless style of the 170 x 110 cm Oval Saarinen Tulip Dining Table creates a sophisticated dining atmosphere with its striking oval silhouette and classic tulip base design. Combining artistry and practicality, this exquisite table will bring an air of refinement and elegance to any meal.

Choose from a variety of marble, laminate, and veneer finishes to complement your décor.

tulip-tables.Name: 120 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Dining Table
tulip-tables.Body:
Explore the stunning 120 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Dining Table! Perfect for both those small and bigger gatherings, you can enjoy cozy meals with family and friends, or entertain larger groups with ease. With its stunning, timeless classic design, this table is as elegant as it is functional - no matter the occasion, it's sure to look stunning!

Select a finish from a range of marble, laminate, and veneer options to best suit your space.

tulip-tables.Name: 90 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Dining Table
tulip-tables.Body:
Although petite, the 90 cm Circular Saarinen Tulip Dining Table packs a gigantic punch! Ideal for kitchens or cozy dining rooms, it's sure to be a standout addition.  Proving size really doesn’t matter, top the 90 cm option with the same marble, laminate or high quality real veneer choices for the matching look.

Choose from an array of marble, laminate, and veneer finishes to accentuate your interior space.
